metadata.title: CVE-2016-0758 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - high
metadata.description:
Integer overflow in lib/asn1_decoder.c in the Linux kernel before 4.6allows local users to gain privileges via crafted ASN.1 data.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-0758` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-22-generic - 4.4.0-22.40
linux-image-4.4.0-22-generic-lpae - 4.4.0-22.40
linux-image-4.4.0-22-lowlatency - 4.4.0-22.40
linux-image-4.4.0-22-powerpc-e500mc - 4.4.0-22.40
linux-image-4.4.0-22-powerpc-smp - 4.4.0-22.40
linux-image-4.4.0-22-powerpc64-emb - 4.4.0-22.40
linux-image-4.4.0-22-powerpc64-smp - 4.4.0-22.40
linux-image-extra-4.4.0-22-generic - 4.4.0-22.40
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1010-raspi2 - 4.4.0-1010.13
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1013-snapdragon - 4.4.0-1013.15
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1001-aws - 4.4.0-1001.10
linux-image-extra-4.4.0-1001-aws - 4.4.0-1001.10
No subscription required

linux-image-4.8.0-36-generic - 4.8.0-36.36~16.04.1
linux-image-4.8.0-36-generic-lpae - 4.8.0-36.36~16.04.1
linux-image-4.8.0-36-lowlatency - 4.8.0-36.36~16.04.1
linux-image-extra-4.8.0-36-generic - 4.8.0-36.36~16.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1003-gke - 4.4.0-1003.3
linux-image-extra-4.4.0-1003-gke - 4.4.0-1003.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-22.40').
linux-raspi2 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1010.13').
linux-snapdragon package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1013.15').
linux-aws package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1001.10').
linux-hwe package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.8.0-36.36~16.04.1').
linux-gke package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1003.3').
